#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	map<string,int>fn;
	vector<string>v;
	map<string,int>::iterator it;
	vector<string>::iterator itv;
	int n,m,i,j,k=1,l,p;
	string s;
	cin >> n;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		cin >> s;
		if(i==1)
		{
			v.push_back(s);
			fn[s]++;
			k=2;
			continue;
		}	
		fn[s]++;
		if(fn[s]==k)
		{
			k++;
			v.push_back(s);
		}
	}
	for(itv=v.begin(),i=1;itv!=v.end();itv++,i++)
	{
		cout << i << ' ' << (*itv) << endl;
	}
}
